title: Mug, ca. 1820–30
provenance: Tower House Antiques, Bangor, Ireland; 1966 Phelps Warren, NY
description: Very heavy, straight-sided body, looped and nothed handle with turned up end cut with tall swirling loops of diamonds above a row of field diamonds,hatching at side near handle, on the bottom star pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Mug, ca. 1820–30.
ca. 1820–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-184.
